AI Description: BLAS (Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms) implemented in native C and suitable for high-performance implementations. BLIS is capable of achieving high levels of performance on various architectures.
Core Features: High-performance BLAS library, portable and flexible, optimized for various modern architectures, includes a BLISlab for automated performance analysis and tuning.
General Tags: Blas, Linear Algebra, High Performance Computing, Optimization
